key.name: indent-width
key.description: The number of spaces to use for a single indent step

key.name: insert-spaces-instead-of-tabs
key.summary: Whether to indent using spaces or tabs
key.description: If true, any new indentation will use spaces instead of tabs.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: If true, line numbers will be shown in the gutter of file comparisons.

key.name: highlight-syntax
key.description: Whether to highlight syntax in comparisons. Because of Meld's own color highlighting, this is off by default.

key.name: show-whitespace
key.description: Selector for individual whitespace character types to be shown. Possible values are 'space', 'tab', 'newline' and 'nbsp'.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: If true, the line containing the cursor will be highlighted in file comparisons.

key.name: use-system-editor
key.description: If false, the defined custom editor will be used instead of the system editor when opening files externally.

key.name: custom-editor-command
key.description: The command used to launch a custom editor. Some limited templating is supported here; at the moment '{file}' and '{line}' are recognised tokens.

key.name: folder-columns
key.description: List of column names in folder comparison and whether they should be displayed.

key.name: folder-ignore-symlinks
key.description: If true, folder comparisons do not follow symbolic links when traversing the folder tree.

key.name: folder-shallow-comparison
key.description: If true, folder comparisons compare files based solely on size and mtime, considering files to be identical if their size and mtime match, and different otherwise.

key.name: folder-time-resolution
key.description: When comparing based on mtime, this is the minimum difference in nanoseconds between two files before they're considered to have different mtimes. This is useful when comparing files between filesystems with different timestamp resolution.

key.name: vc-show-commit-margin
key.summary: Show margin in commit message editor
key.description: If true, a guide will be displayed to show what column the margin is at in the version control commit message editor.

key.name: vc-commit-margin
key.summary: Margin column in commit message editor
key.description: The column of the margin is at in the version control commit message editor.

key.name: vc-break-commit-message
key.description: If true, the version control commit message editor will hard-wrap (i.e., insert line breaks) at the defined commit margin before commit.
